PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADA OCCUPATIONAL HEALTH AND SAFETY REGULATIONS, to include provisions for ergonomics-related hazards to prevent accidents and injury to health arising out of, linked with, or occuring in the course of employment in the federal jurisdiction.
